author: Jeremy Herb, Zachary Cohen, Annie Grayer and Ryan Nobles, CNN
title: What to watch for in January 6 hearing focused on pressure campaign in the states - CNN
description: The House select committee investigating the January 6, 2021, attack on the US Capitol turns its attention Tuesday to the campaign to pressure state-level officials to overturn the 2020 election results.
content: (CNN)The House select committee investigating the January 6, 2021, attack on the US Capitol turns its attention Tuesday to the campaign to pressure state-level officials to overturn the 2020 election… [+7323 chars]

author: Ilan Ben Zion
title: Israeli government fast-tracks bill to dissolve parliament - The Associated Press - en Español
description: JERUSALEM (AP) — Israel's outgoing coalition government will fast-track a bill this week to dissolve parliament, setting up the country for its fifth elections in three years, a Cabinet minister said Tuesday.
